content: grilled into this free crochet hot dog amigurumi pattern are all the flavorful fascinations of summer barbecues backyards bustling with the boisterous sounds of a cookout fresh franks hissing against the hot grates of a grill and food requests being called out over a round of rambunctious laughter while you patiently wait for your food to finishing grilling there s no better way to soak in the summer vibes than with this free crochet hot dog amigurumi pattern **pattern information ** this free crochet hot dog amigurumi pattern has a difficulty rating of **intermediate** the finished dimensions are **2 25 inches height by 4 75 inches width by 3 inches depth ** ∗ you may also make your pieces larger or smaller by increasing or decreasing your yarn weight and/or hook size respectively ∗finished dimensions are calculated from a model using medium weight yarn a size h-8 5 mm crochet hook the yu/yo method and the following gauge **18 single_crochet x 21 row = 4 inches** **supplies ** * size h-8 5 mm crochet hook * medium 4 weight yarn in 4 colors * yarn a orange example uses red heart super saver coral * yarn b yellow example uses red heart super saver saffron * yarn c beige example uses loops & threads soft classic bisque * yarn d off-white example uses red heart super saver aran * 10mm black safety eyes x2 * black embroidery floss * pink embroidery floss or pink yarn example uses red heart super saver perfect pink * polyester fiberfill * yarn needle * scissors * stitch markers **alternate yarn supplies ** **color variation 2 as seen on the right in cover photo ** * medium 4 weight yarn in 4 colors * yarn a orange example uses red heart super saver coral * yarn b red example uses red heart super saver cherry red * yarn c beige example uses loops & threads soft classic bisque * yarn d off-white example uses red heart super saver aran **color variation 3 as seen in the second photo ** the chunky example of this pattern measures 2 75 inches height by 5 75 inches width by 3 5 inches depth using the following gauge 16 single_crochet x 15 row = 4 inches all supplies remain the same except for the following replacements * super bulky 6 weight yarn in 4 colors * yarn a dull red example uses premier parfait chunky maple leaf * yarn b yellow example uses premier parfait chunky summer squash * yarn c beige example uses premier parfait chunky shell * yarn d off-white example uses premier parfait chunky cream * 14mm black safety eyes x2 * pink yarn example uses premier parfait chunky pink lemonade * black embroidery floss doubled **terminology ** this free crochet hot dog amigurumi pattern uses english us terminology * st sts = stitch stitches * chain = chain stitch * slip_stitch = slip_stitch * single_crochet = single_crochet * decrease = single_crochet 2 together over the
